channel.title: Austinscape Jam-Packed
channel.description:
Just wanted to say that... CLIENT IS DONE!!!! I might make one change though.
I also made it un-editable, but i have editable version..
NO JAVA FILES IN IT. Used JAR maker to make a JAR file.
Client is done, few things left in server.
NOTE: MOST LIKELY THIS WILL TAKE THE PLACE OF AUSTINSCAPE. AFTER A FEW DAYS, IF THE PLAYERS DONT LIKE IT ILL SWITCH BACK....YOU WILL LIKE IT THOUGH! I LOVE IT X100 MORE THEN REGULAR AUSTINSCAPE! MUST USE CLIENT!
Client is sweet though, got bandos and saradomin god in the godwars, WORKING BARROWS (nothing the same from austinscape now, except home)
[glow=red,2,300]Server Last stuff to do:[/glow]
Add NPC drops
Make Giants (Hill, fire, ice, moss giants) able to be a slayer task
Add A fewww Shops (Not to many)
[glow=green,2,300]Client Last Stuff to do:[/glow]
Make tabs that link to nice places
TABS:
Austinscape home
Austinscape website
Youtube
RuneL0cus
And one more, idk yet.
Sneak peak pics: [IMG]http://i279.photobucket.com/albums/kk130/3219612345/A.jpg[/img]
PS---I Might make new background which is similar to the picture above this sentance.
[IMG]http://i279.photobucket.com/albums/kk130/3219612345/Client1.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i279.photobucket.com/albums/kk130/3219612345/client2.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i279.photobucket.com/albums/kk130/3219612345/client3.jpg[/img]
PLEASE NOTE: I CHANGED LOG IN BOX SO ITS INVISIBLE AND YOU SEE BACKGROUND INSTEAD..ALL YOU SEE IS THE LOG IN BUTTONS
ALSO::
I MADE SO DEFAULT COLOUR OF TEXT IS THE SAME AS glow2:
VIDEO:
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZMlt23dLyBQ]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZMlt23dLyBQ[/url]
Video is nice..sorta
